title: Vanished in Vermont
description: In 2002, a lone gunman robbed an armored car company in Vermont making off with nearly two million in cash. To this day the crime remains unsolved and a bizarre mystery that's stumped the FBI.
author: content@audiochuck.com (audiochuck)
